headline: A. O. Smith’s 2026 Outlook And Buybacks Might Change The Case For Investing In AOS
summary: A. O. Smith Corporation recently reported its fourth-quarter and full-year 2025 results, showing slightly higher annual sales of US$3,830.2 million, increased net income of US$546.2 million, diluted EPS of US$3.85, and issued 2026 guidance for net sales of US$3,900 million to US$4,020 million and EPS of US$3.85 to US$4.15. The company also continued to shrink its share count by repurchasing 923,623 shares for US$65.42 million in late 2025, bringing total buybacks under its long-running...
